message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its unique benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget allows me to pay no more than $1,200,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the value this product brings to your business significantly outweighs the price difference. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This offer represents a significant investment from my side, and I believe it's a fair reflection of the product's worth.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am able to offer $1,225,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our interests. I look forward to your response.
